attributes.action: Fathers are granted more rights for there child child maintenance to be scrapped
attributes.additional_details:
To many fathers committing suicide because off child maintenance abolish child maintenance fathers can’t live paying what they have to pay child maintenance calculates before tax instead off after tax this is why fathers are find it hard live themselves and commit suicide before the can’t afford to survive and pay bills 

SIGN SIGN SIGN!!
attributes.background: I want the government to fully understand that every child deserves to have equal time with their fathers no matter what the age is. A child’s relationship with their father is just as important as the relationship the child has with their mother. Abolish child maintenance

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
